For our observations, we used monthly temperature, precipitation, and vapor pressure data available from the CRU TS3.23, which is a gridded time series climate dataset (
35 ). The data coverage included all areas of the contiguous United States at a 0.5° resolution. Estimates for saturated vapor pressure ( e s) were derived using the 2008 World Meteorological Organization Commission for Instruments and Methods of Observation Guide conversion equation
e s
= 6.112 × exp (
22.46 t
272.62 + t
)
(1) where t is the temperature at a given grid point at a given time.
